statements: DELETE FROM data_usage_patterns WHERE user_id = 100 AND data_plan = 'Basic';
DELETE FROM data_usage_patterns WHERE data_plan = 'Premium' AND data_usage > 1000;
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND data_usage > 100.0
DELETE FROM data_plans WHERE plan_name = 'Gold Plan' AND data_limit < 500.0
DELETE FROM user_data WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM data_plans WHERE data_limit < 300.0)
DELETE FROM Personalized_Plans WHERE user_id = 1 AND plan_id = 1
DELETE FROM Usage_Patterns WHERE user_id = 123 AND data_usage > 100
DELETE FROM Data_Plans WHERE plan_id = 345 AND data_limit < 50
DELETE FROM Personalized_Plans WHERE user_id = 456 AND plan_id = 789
DELETE FROM usage_data WHERE used_data_amount < 100 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM personalized_plans WHERE personalized_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
